name: Jump Tiny Dino!
description:
A short game for Dino Jam 1. Jump to avoid the shockwave of the passing brontosaurus herd. You won't get stomped, just a bit dizzy! Try to make it to the end getting hit by less than 100 shockwaves.

Made in a few hours for the TIC-80 fantasy console. All graphics and sound effects created for the jam.  My first time drawing pixel art characters and using Asprite.
